ygData.subject: Re: Amulet of Order
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Warning?  I think the wood elf male plate helm is the coolest plate helm in the game, bar none!  I love that giant bird or whatever it is on the front.
ygData.messageBody:
"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:

> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> WARNING. bronze and plate look exactly the same except for color. the
> helms on wood elf males and females are hidious. i wear a fine silk turbin
> off the sand giant Hatar, looks like cloth so doesn't show on body.

Warning? I think the wood elf male plate helm is the coolest plate helm in the
game, bar none! I love that giant bird or whatever it is on the front. The
players in my party used to tease me about it a little until I had the full
plate suit though, because on its own, it makes you look a little top heavy.

I guess it's all a matter of taste, but I really have to disagree with you on
this one :)

Jyzan
